pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Hardware-Aware Optimization and Design AutomationReusable Python utilities for hardware-aware optimization and design automation.## Feature Synopsis+ [ ] intermediate representation (IR) system+ [ ] Xilinx tool backend+ [ ] Xilinx report parser+ [ ] Intel tool backend+ [ ] Intel report parser## Getting Started### Prerequisites+ Python 3.6+ and corresponding `pip`<details><summary>How to install Python 3.6+ on Ubuntu 18.04+ and CentOS 7?</summary>#### Ubuntu 18.04+```bashsudo apt install python3 python3-pip```#### CentOS 7```bashsudo yum install python3 python3-pip```</details>### Installing from PyPI```bashpython3 -m pip install --user --upgrade haoda```### Installing from Source```bashpython3 setup.py install --user```### Installing for Development```bashpython3 -m pip install --editable .```
